title: DEVCON JavaScript Security
shortDescription: Runtime Application Security Protection for End Users
longDescription:
With DEVCON JavaScript Security you can easily protect your users from malicious attacks.

* Monitor and block:
* Data skimming
*  Formjacking attacks
* Clickjacking
* Cross-site scripting attacks
* Outdated JavaScript vulnerabilities
* Unauthorized iFrames
* Phishing attacks

DEVCON JavaScript Security is a developer-first web application security provider. Protect your site and users from malicious attacks that happen in the end user’s browser.

Easy 5 minute set up. Monitoring free to start.
instructions:
Create an account on  [DEVCON](https://devcon.technology/signup/cloudflare/) to get your Cloudflare API key.

Monitoring free to start. Upgrade to stop attacks and block real-time.
author: DEVCON

proposedApp.title: DEVCON JavaScript Security
proposedApp.shortDescription: Stop Magecart and Third-Party JavaScript Attacks.
proposedApp.longDescription:
**DEVCON JavaScript Security** is a Browser Firewall to protect your site and customers from Magecart, formjacking, credit card skimming, privacy violations and phishing attacks as well as any attacks originating from Third-Party JavaScript.

Websites behave differently when rendered in a real browser and can be affected by many factors including compromised vendors, malicious browser plugins, and XSS attacks. DEVCON mitigates these security gaps by providing real-time monitoring, detection and response for attacks that happen in the end user's browser.  

With DEVCON JavaScript Security you can easily control your website security: 
* Stop Magecart/form-jacking attacks. 
* Stop click-jacking and block infringers from iFraming your intellectual property. 
* Allow granular control over how scripts interact with web pages. 
* Centrally manage multiple 'Content Security Policies' across all websites.  
* Transparency into 'Site Spoofing'.
proposedApp.instructions:
5 minute set up: 
1. Create an account on [DEVCON](https://devcon.technology/signup/). 
2. Verify your email address. 
3. Copy the 'DEVCON key' into the Cloudflare App Settings. {Your Key will automatically be saved}
4. Enjoy the robust security provided by DEVCON :)
proposedApp.author: DEVCON

proposedApp.title: DEVCON JavaScript Security
proposedApp.shortDescription: Stop Magecart and Third-Party JavaScript Attacks.
proposedApp.longDescription:
**DEVCON JavaScript Security** is a Browser Firewall to protect your site and customers from Magecart, formjacking, credit card skimming, privacy violations and phishing attacks as well as any attacks originating from Third-Party JavaScript.

Websites behave differently when rendered in a real browser and can be affected by many factors including compromised vendors, malicious browser plugins, and XSS attacks. DEVCON mitigates these security gaps by providing real-time monitoring, detection and response for attacks that happen in the end user's browser.  

With DEVCON JavaScript Security you can easily control your website security: 
* Stop Magecart/form-jacking attacks. 
* Stop click-jacking and block infringers from iFraming your intellectual property. 
* Allow granular control over how scripts interact with web pages. 
* Centrally manage multiple 'Content Security Policies' across all websites.  
* Transparency into 'Site Spoofing'.
proposedApp.instructions:
5 minute set up: 
1. Create an account on [DEVCON](https://devcon.technology/signup/). 
2. Verify your email address. 
3. Navigate to to _Client Security -> Install Alerts_.
4. Copy the __Cloudflare API Key__ into the __Devcon Client Security Key__ input box below. {Your Key will automatically be saved}
5. Enjoy the robust security provided by DEVCON :)
proposedApp.author: DEVCON

proposedApp.longDescription:

proposedApp.instructions:
5 minute set up: 
1. Create an account on [DEVCON](https://devcon.technology/signup/?source=cloudflare). 
2. Verify your email address. 
3. Follow the setup instructions. 
4. Copy the __Cloudflare API Key__ generated during sign up and paste into the __DEVCON Client Security Key__ input box below. {Your Key will automatically be saved}
5. Log back into the [DEVCON Portal](https://devcon.technology/) to see your results.
